data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
CGI::Untaint::DNS::hostname was just too long; it may be that
    someone else in future will have need to untaint other data for dns
    but I think 'hostname' is pretty unambiguous (though it is also
    supporting FQDN hostname).

    Listing this in the module list will make it more noticeable and
    likely to be found by someone who needs it.
